channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率在连续两周下降后本月首次上升

item.title: 私人信贷基金正在牺牲更大一部分费用，以保证资金流入华尔街增长最快的市场。
item.description:
Private credit funds are sacrificing a bigger chunk of their fees to keep capital flowing into Wall Street’s fastest-growing market. https://t.co/RmeqVKk28X

item.title: 消息人士称，随着英国越来越多地转向海湾地区以满足其对外国投资的需求，有关英国最富传奇色彩的报纸之一的混乱争论可能会损害双方更广泛的关系，并使未来的投资受到质疑。
item.description:
As the UK increasingly turns to the Gulf to fulfill its needs for foreign investment, the messy row over one of Britain’s most storied newspapers could hurt the wider relationship and put future investment in doubt, sources say https://t.co/hIMpa8Xp2J

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 铀在经历了 10 个月的飙升之后可能失去了一些激情，但分析师和投资者并没有对这种核燃料的长期前景失去信心。
item.description:
Uranium may have lost some sizzle after an electrifying 10-month rally, but analysts and investors aren’t losing faith in the long-term prospects of the nuclear fuel https://t.co/iPnkJ8a4ht

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 总部位于伦敦的大宗商品贸易融资信贷提供商木村资本公司（Kimura Capital）正在启动一项对冲基金，希望利用投资者对自然资源重新燃起的兴趣。
item.description:
Kimura Capital, a London-based provider of trade finance credit for commodities, is starting a hedge fund as it looks to capitalize on resurgent investor interest in natural resources. https://t.co/t29BekHFIZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: FTX 前高管和破产加密货币交易所的一名用户共同建立了一个平台，该平台为债权人购买了 6000 万美元的债权
item.description:
A former FTX executive and a user of the bankrupt crypto exchange are among a group who built a platform that has bought $60 million in creditors' claims https://t.co/qYz7jGl7Gz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 捷克电力公司公布的盈利和股息展望低于预期，CEZ 股价创下九个月来最大跌幅。
item.description:
CEZ shares dropped the most in nine months after the Czech power utility published lower-than-expected outlook for earnings and dividend https://t.co/oPLXdHs0jw

item.title: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周四在国会听证会上作证，预示着在即将到来的大选中将就税收政策展开党派之争。
item.description:
Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen testified Thursday at a congressional hearing that presaged a partisan battle over tax policy in the coming election. https://t.co/1sxnMCt4FH

item.title: 本月早些时候，一艘原定运载俄罗斯石油的油轮在丹麦水域与另一艘船相撞，丹麦海事当局扣留了这艘油轮。
item.description:
Danish maritime authorities have detained a tanker that was due to carry Russian oil after it collided with another ship in its waters earlier this month https://t.co/OycTaAEfBz

item.title: 在三月份的短短几周内，埃及摆脱了数十年来最严重的货币危机，成为新兴市场中最热门的贸易国
item.description:
In a few short weeks in March, Egypt emerged from its worst currency crisis in decades to become the hottest trade in emerging markets https://t.co/wDePANGI0l

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 联合国核监察机构警告说，俄罗斯对核供应链的控制不可能一蹴而就，威胁过早断绝关系将损害全球能源市场。
item.description:
The United Nation’s nuclear watchdog cautioned there’s no quick way to loosen Russia’s grip on nuclear supply chains and threatening to sever ties too soon would harm global energy markets https://t.co/FSPWax7Ia1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁纽豪斯家族早早就在 Reddit 上下注。结果获得了 3700% 的收益。
item.description:
The billionaire Newhouse family made an early bet on Reddit. It's paid off with a 3,700% gain. https://t.co/FzY94TBcaQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯的国旗航空公司将逐步迁出利雅得机场，为王国最新成立的航空公司腾出空间，使其能够专注于吉达的主要枢纽。
item.description:
Saudi Arabia’s flag carrier is to gradually move out of Riyadh’s airport to make room for the kingdom’s newest airline, allowing it to focus on its primary hub in Jeddah https://t.co/CVUtwqGjij

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 美国建议其七国集团盟国创建一个特殊目的机构，发行至少 500 亿美元的债券，以冻结的俄罗斯主权资产的利润为担保，并将收益用于支持乌克兰。
item.description:
The US proposed to its G-7 allies that they create a special purpose vehicle to issue at least $50 billion of bonds backed by the profits from frozen Russian sovereign assets and use the proceeds to support Ukraine. https://t.co/KegJXQGUIa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）计划完成其作为奥地利国家银行行长的现任任期--即使政府已开始物色人选来填补该机构的重要职位
item.description:

item.title: 路易达孚公司的利润连续第二年超过 10 亿美元，这家农作物巨头继续从动荡的农产品市场中获益。

Louis Dreyfus’s profit exceeded $1 billion for a second year as the crop giant continued to benefit from volatile agricultural markets. https://t.co/cWFkEME02Y

item.title: 医生们成功地将经过基因编辑的猪肾脏移植到一名活体患者体内，朝着利用动物资源帮助缓解器官严重短缺的问题迈出了一步
item.description:
Doctors successfully transplanted a genetically-edited pig kidney into a living patient, a step towards using animal sources to help alleviate critical shortages of organs https://t.co/vdURMyFW8e

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 大流行病后笼罩世界经济的巨大通胀恐慌突然不再让央行行长们夜不能寐了
item.description:

item.title: 如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）不能在州民事欺诈案中缴纳上诉保证金，他在纽约韦斯特切斯特郡的房产可能面临被查封的风险
item.description:
Donald Trump’s properties in New York's Westchester County may be at risk of being seized if he fails to post an appeal bond in the state's civil fraud case https://t.co/Ls3ckmMpAg

item.title: 如果这位激进投资者下月当选迪士尼董事会成员，Nelson Peltz 将得到一群商界领袖的支持，以改善迪士尼的业绩。
item.description:
Nelson Peltz has been backed by a group of business leaders to improve performance at Disney, should the activist investor be elected to the board next month https://t.co/9FrSigop41

item.title: 瑞典气候政策监督机构对瑞典政府进行了抨击，称内阁声称其计划将在 2045 年前实现温室气体净零排放的说法具有 "误导性"。
item.description:
The Swedish government is rapped by the country’s climate policy watchdog, which said the cabinet’s claim that its plans will lead to net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2045 is “misleading” https://t.co/if4Q4myPcP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 挪威私营部门产业工人与雇主之间的工资谈判将进行调解，以避免谈判破裂后发生罢工
item.description:
Wage negotiations between Norwegian private-sector industrial workers and employers will go to mediation to avoid a strike after the talks broke down https://t.co/sNbj35TlIM
